description: Identify the age group with the highest number of murder victims.
How many murder victims were infants (under 1 year old)?
Determine the total number of murder victims in the age group '1 to 4 years'.
Find any age group that has a significantly lower number of murder victims compared to others.
Compute the average number of murder victims across all age groups.
Determine the range of the number of murder victims across all age groups.
Identify if there is a correlation between the age of the victims and the number of murder victims.
What age groups have more than 200 murder victims?
Order the age groups from the highest to the lowest number of murder victims.
Identify any clusters of age groups with similar numbers of murder victims.
